content: p2 row 4 sl1p k7 ssk k1 turn rnds 8 14 repeat rounds 1 7 cont in this way adding 1 st between slip_stitch and ssk or p2tog on each row ie row 5 sl1p p8 p2tog p1 turn 2nd size row 6 sl1p k9 ssk k1 turn etc until all of the heel sts rnds 1 3 knit 44 sts are used depending on how many sts are in your heel flap you may find that the k1 and p1 st is not required at the end rnds 4 k4 p3 k7 p3 k9 p3 k7 p3 k5 of the last two row rnds 5 k3 p1 twice k5 p1 k3 p1 k7 p1 k3 p1 k5 p1 k across heel sts if required to bring you to the left hand k3 p1 k4 side of the heel flap with the outside of the flap facing you rnds 6 k2 p1 k5 p1 k3 p1 k5 twice p1 k5 p1 k3 twice ready to pick up 1 st for every 2 row of heel flap knitted rnds 7 p2 k7 p3 k7 p5 k7 p3 twice remember that if you made the heel flap bigger you will rnds 8 14 repeat rounds 1 7 need to pick up more sts once you have picked up the sts place marker k across the top of the foot sts place marker then pick up 3rd size 1 st for every 2 row of heel flap knitted up the other side of rnds 1 3 knit 48 sts the heel k across the top of the heel and then shape gusset rnds 4 k4 p4 k8 3 times p4 k4 as follows rnds 5 k3 p1 k4 p1 k6 3 times p1 k4 p1 k3 rnds 6 k2 p1 k6 p1 k4 3 times p1 k6 p1 k2 rnds 7 p2 k8 p4 3 times k8 p2 rnds 8 14 repeat rounds 1 7 2 note charts if you are using dpns and/or have placed your sts on a 1st size stitch holder you can arrange the needles as follows key needle 1 for sts across heel needle 2 for picked-up sts down side of foot needle 3 for stitches across top of foot work sts off stitch holder if required needle 4 for picked-up sts on other side of foot you may find that stitch markers are not required at first shape gusset round 1 k to 3 sts before the marker k2tog k1 slip marker k to marker slip marker k1 ssk k to marker round 2 slip marker k to marker slip marker k to 3 sts before marker round 3 k2tog k1 slip marker k to marker slip marker k1 ssk k to marker repeat rnds 2 3 to shape the gusset cont in this way decreasing by 2 sts at the gusset on every other round until there are 40 44 48 52 sts on the needle once you have reached the required number of sts cont
